enGB: You may use your {g}Strength{/g} modifier in place of your {g}Dexterity{/g} modifier for your attack rolls when making a ranged attack with thrown weapons. You may also use the Power Attack feat instead of the Deadly Aim feat when attacking with thrown weapons.
zhCN: 你使用{g}力量{/g}调整值取代{g}敏捷{/g}调整值，来计算使用投掷武器时的远程攻击检定。同时你也可以对远程投掷武器应用猛力攻击专长，来替代致命瞄准。

enGB:
{g|Encyclopedia:Size}Size{/g}: Large
{g|Encyclopedia:Speed}Speed{/g}: 50 ft.
{g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}: +4 natural armor
{g|Encyclopedia:Attack}Attacks{/g}: bite ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g}), 2 hooves (1d6)
{g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}Ability scores{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Str{/g} 16, {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dex{/g} 13, {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Con{/g} 15, {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Int{/g} 2, {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wis{/g} 12, {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Cha{/g} 6
Special qualities: {g|Encyclopedia:Scent}scent{/g}
At 4th level, a horse gains Str +2 and Con +2 and its hoof attacks become primary.
When riding a horse, you gain a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to AC and on attack rolls against enemies of Medium size or smaller.
zhCN:
{g|Encyclopedia:Size}体型{/g}：大型
{g|Encyclopedia:Speed}速度{/g}: 50 尺.
{g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}防御等级{/g}: +4 天生防御
{g|Encyclopedia:Attack}攻击{/g}: 啮咬 ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g}), 2 蹄踢 (1d6)
{g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}属性值{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}力量{/g} 16, {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}敏捷{/g} 13, {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}体质{/g} 15, {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}智力{/g} 2, {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}感知{/g} 12, {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}魅力{/g} 6
特性: {g|Encyclopedia:Scent}灵敏嗅觉{/g}
达到4级后，马的力量+2，体质+2，蹄踢成为主要攻击。
骑马对抗中等体型或更小的敌人时，防御等级与攻击检定获得+1{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}。

enGB:
Reddit's own character class. CHA TO EVERYTHING! 
Basically Fighter class with +CHA to all stats and CHA spellcasting. (This is a meme class I made, don't take it too seriously)'

魅力上一切的网红职业！
拥有魅力上一切和魅力施法的战士。（这是纯粹的娱乐职业，别太认真了）

enGB: Swordmasters are proficient with all simpe and martial swords, plut the quarterstaff. They are proficient with light armor, but not with shields.
zhCN: Swordmasters are proficient with all simpe and martial swords, plut the quarterstaff. They are proficient with light armor, but not with shields.

enGB: You gain two wing attacks. These are secondary natural attacks that each deal 2d8 damage
zhCN: 你获得两次翼击攻击（2d8伤害），视为次要天生攻击。

enGB: A swordmaster meditates to strengthen her spiritual connection to her blade. She strives to perfect her skills by mastering six deadly trances.
zhCN: A swordmaster meditates to strengthen her spiritual connection to her blade. She strives to perfect her skills by mastering six deadly trances.

enGB: A swordmaster meditates to strengthen her spiritual connection to her blade. She strives to perfect her skills by mastering six deadly trances.
zhCN: A swordmaster meditates to strengthen her spiritual connection to her blade. She strives to perfect her skills by mastering six deadly trances.

enGB: At 3rd level, the swordmaster chooses one trance from the list below. She chooses another trance at 6th, 9th, 12th, 15th, and 18th level. She can only use one type of trance at a time.
zhCN: At 3rd level, the swordmaster chooses one trance from the list below. She chooses another trance at 6th, 9th, 12th, 15th, and 18th level. She can only use one type of trance at a time.

enGB: The swordmaster’s blade rises and falls with the graceful sweeping arcs of the mountain crane. When in this trance, a swordmaster gains the benefits of the Crane Style feat.
zhCN: The swordmaster’s blade rises and falls with the graceful sweeping arcs of the mountain crane. When in this trance, a swordmaster gains the benefits of the Crane Style feat.

enGB: Like the dragon, the swordmaster has honed the steadiness of her mind and body. When in this trance, a swordmaster gains the benefits of the Dragon Style feat.

enGB: Using the swiftness of the leopard, a swordmaster’s evasive footwork confuses her opponents. When in this trance, a swordmaster gains the benefits of the Mobility feat.

enGB: As the monkey springs, the swordmaster leaps from the reach of her enemies. While in this trance, a swordmaster gains the benefits of the Trip feat and Fury's Fall feat.

enGB: Like the serpent, the swordmaster’s quick movements allow her to catch her opponent unawares. While in this trance, a swordmaster gains the benefits of the Feint feat with a +4 bonus to Feint.
